slide_descriptions.title: Software Engineering Job Market 2025
slide_descriptions.subtitle: Trends, Salaries & Career Opportunities
content: Comprehensive analysis of current market conditions
Based on 2024-2025 employment data
Strategic insights for career planning
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Modern tech presentation title slide with professional data visualization elements. Clean white background with blue and green accent colors. Abstract digital network pattern in the background suggesting technology and data flow. Professional typography with the main title prominently displayed.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Corporate tech presentation style - clean, modern, minimalist design with data-driven aesthetics. Blue (#1E5FAC) and green (#2ECC71) color scheme. Sans-serif typography. Subtle gradient backgrounds and professional iconography.

slide_descriptions.title: Market Overview: Steady Growth Recovery
content: 17% projected job growth through 2033 (327,000 new roles)
~140,000 annual openings including turnover
Tech unemployment at 2% (tight labor market)
Big Tech headcount recovery: Meta +19%, Google +16%, Apple +13%
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Business dashboard showing upward trending growth charts. Vertical bar graph showing 17% job growth projection. Line graph demonstrating recovery of Big Tech companies with company logos (Meta, Google, Apple, Amazon). Clean data visualization with percentage indicators and growth arrows.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Data-driven presentation with clear bar charts and trend lines. Professional color palette with growth indicators (green up arrows). Corporate logos integrated cleanly into visualizations. Clean white space with structured layout.

slide_descriptions.title: Salary Trends: Strong Compensation Growth
content: Median salary: $133,080 (24% growth since 2018)
Top 10% exceed $200K annually
Middle 50% range: $101K - $167K
66% of managers increasing starting salaries for key roles
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Financial visualization showing salary data. Horizontal bar chart displaying salary ranges from $101K to $200K+. Dollar signs and currency symbols integrated into design. Upward trending arrow showing 24% growth since 2018. Clean financial dashboard layout with percentage indicators.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Financial data visualization with professional charts. Green color scheme for positive growth. Clean typography with currency formatting. Modern dashboard aesthetic with clear data hierarchy.

slide_descriptions.title: AI Engineering: The Explosive Growth Sector
content: Dramatic surge in AI engineering listings since mid-2023
32% of AI jobs concentrated in San Francisco Bay Area
Top employers: OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, Google, Amazon
Remote work INCREASING for AI roles (unlike overall market)
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: AI-focused technology visualization with neural network graphics. Map of California highlighting San Francisco Bay Area with 32% concentration. Logos of top AI companies (OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, Google, Amazon). Explosive growth represented by expanding circles or upward curves. Remote work icon with upward trend.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: High-tech aesthetic with neural network patterns. Purple and blue color scheme suggesting AI/ML innovation. Clean corporate logos. Geographic data visualization. Modern tech-forward design elements.

slide_descriptions.title: Skills in High Demand: 2025 Requirements
content: Core languages: Python, Java, C++, JavaScript/TypeScript, C#
Cloud platforms: AWS, Azure, GCP expertise
DevOps tools: Docker, Kubernetes essential
54% of hiring managers report AI reshaping skill requirements
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Technology stack visualization showing programming language logos (Python, Java, C++, JavaScript, C#) arranged by demand. Cloud platform logos (AWS, Azure, GCP) and DevOps tool icons (Docker, Kubernetes). Bar chart or ranking system showing skill demand levels. Clean icon-based layout with 54% statistic highlighted.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Technical diagram with clean iconography. Color-coded categories for different skill types. Professional development environment aesthetic. Clear visual hierarchy showing skill importance levels.

slide_descriptions.title: Remote Work: The New Normal
content: 27% of software jobs advertised as remote
80% of engineers expected remote work by end 2025
50% hybrid model emerging as standard
Non-tech sectors aggressively hiring remote engineers (91% growth)
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Modern work environment visualization showing home office setup with computer and collaboration tools. Pie chart showing remote work statistics (27%, 80%, 50%). Growth chart showing 91% increase in non-tech sector hiring. Work-life balance imagery with calendar and video conferencing elements. Clean, professional remote work aesthetic.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Work-life balance visualization with warm, approachable color scheme. Modern home office aesthetic. Clean data visualization integrated with lifestyle imagery. Professional yet approachable design.

slide_descriptions.title: Career Opportunities & Market Shifts
content: 50%+ of open roles are senior-level or higher
86% of high-paying positions at publicly traded companies
Platform vs Product AI engineering specialization paths
Non-tech sectors: Finance (+91%), Industrial Automation (+73%)
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Career progression flowchart showing senior-level opportunities. Pie chart showing 86% public company advantage. Split path diagram showing Platform vs Product AI engineering specializations. Bar chart comparing growth in Finance (+91%) and Industrial Automation (+73%) sectors. Professional career planning visualization.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Corporate career development aesthetic. Professional flowcharts and diagrams. Business growth indicators. Clean corporate color scheme with strategic planning visual elements.

slide_descriptions.title: Strategic Takeaways for 2025
content: Market stabilizing with strong growth trajectory
AI integration skills becoming essential baseline
Remote work flexibility remains competitive advantage
Continuous learning critical for career advancement
slide_descriptions.image_prompt: Forward-looking conclusion slide with success imagery. Upward trending arrow or growth visualization representing market stabilization. AI integration iconography with skill development path. Remote work flexibility symbol. Graduation cap or learning icon representing continuous education. Clean, inspiring visual layout with strategic elements.
slide_descriptions.visual_style: Inspirational conclusion design with forward-looking aesthetics. Professional success imagery. Clean white space with accent colors. Strategic planning visual elements. Motivational yet professional tone.
